actions.name: Petrifying Breath (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The gorgon exhales poisonous, petrifying gas in a 30-foot cone. Creatures in the area must make a DC 13 CON save. On a failure, a creature takes 21 (6d6) poison damage and is restrained as it begins to turn to stone. On a success, a creature takes half the damage and isn't restrained. A restrained creature must repeat the save at the end of its next turn. On a success, the effect ends on the creature. On a failure, the creature is petrified until freed by the greater restoration spell or other magic.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The gorgon makes one Gore attack and one Hooves attack.

actions.name: Gore
actions.desc: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 18 (2d12+5) piercing damage.

actions.name: Hooves
actions.desc: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 16 (2d10+5) bludgeoning damage.

reactions.name: Poisonous Retort
reactions.desc: When the gorgon is hit by an attack from a creature it can see within 10 feet of it, the gorgon can snort angrily, releasing a puff of poisonous gas at the creature. The attacker must succeed on a DC 16 CON save or be poisoned until the end of its next turn.

special_abilities.name: Monstrosity Resilience
special_abilities.desc: The gorgon is resistant to exhaustion and to the frightened condition.

special_abilities.name: Trampling Charge
special_abilities.desc: If the gorgon moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a Gore attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a DC 16 STR save or be knocked prone. If the target is prone, the gorgon can make one Hooves attack against it as a bonus action.
